description.name: n8n Webhook
description.tagline: Send WHMCS notification rules to an n8n webhook.
description.long: A simple notification provider that posts rule-based WHMCS notifications to an n8n webhook for automation (ticket routing, invoice alerts, order workflows, etc.).
features: JSON payload with ticket, client and order metadata
Optional inclusion of custom client fields and account manager
Supports Bearer token or custom header authentication
